metadata.description: You're Xena the Warrior Princess and your thousand strong army has fallen to an implacable and ancient evil.   What do you do?   You suck it up and summon the only ally who stands any hope at all of helping you prevent the end of the world.   Unfortunately, that lone man is the wise ass, ass kicking, time traveling, woman kissing, boom sticker known as Ash!
metadata.name: Army Of Darkness/Xena: Forever…And A Day
